message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you an exclusive deal on this amazing product. I think you'll love it!
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase the product, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I have to consider the value of the product and my costs. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get a bit closer to my minimum price. How about we meet at $11000?
